description: You will hear an interview with a champion called Maria Anderson.

questions.question: Maria decided to take up gymnastics…
options: at a gymnastics competition.
in a sport lesson at the school.
when she read a book about a gymnast.

questions.question: When did Maria realize she could be a champion gymnast?
options: When she won some local competitions.
As soon as she started gymnastics.
When a well-known coach offered to teach her.

questions.question: Why does Maria think success has not changed her?
options: She believes she is a sensible person.
Her parents help her live a normal life.
People tell her she’s the same before.

questions.question: What does Maria say about school?
options: She feels too tired to study.
She has little time with school friends.
She is allowed to miss some lessons.

questions.question: What does Maria do in her free time?
options: make videos
go to concerts
watch cartoon films

questions.question: What is Maria’s favourite thing in her room at home?
options: A poster of a band with a singer
A glass case with her cups and prizes
A picture of herself with a gymnast
